rows.label: qst106012_msg0001
rows.name: Hana back now!

rows.label: qst106012_msg0002
rows.name:
Welcome back, Hana. Kiku
feel that Hana seem somehow
more grown up already.

rows.label: qst106012_msg0003
rows.name: Kiku correct! Hana is true lady now!

rows.label: qst106012_msg0004
rows.name:
Kiku done with preparing new
outfit, and preparations for
upgrade all finished too.

rows.label: qst106012_msg0005
rows.name:
Only one thing left - waiting for
device to finish charging up.

rows.label: qst106012_msg0006
rows.name:
So it won't be long until
Hana-chan has a brand new
form of her very own!

rows.label: qst106012_msg0007
rows.name: Tora starting to get nervous...

rows.label: qst106012_msg0008
rows.name: So, when do we start the upgrade?

rows.label: qst106012_msg0009
rows.name:
Mo-mo-mo... Charging of
device take one week.

rows.label: qst106012_msg0010
rows.name:
Whaaaa?! How can it take a whole week
just for the thing to power up?

rows.label: qst106012_msg0011
rows.name:
Is only natural! Upgrading of
Hana require immense power!

rows.label: qst106012_msg0012
rows.name: Not simple easy process!

rows.label: qst106012_msg0013
rows.name:
We can't just wait around for
a whole week, though... I'd go
crazy from the anticipation!

rows.label: qst106012_msg0014
rows.name:
Isn't there any way of speeding
up the charging process?

rows.label: qst106012_msg0015
rows.name: Mo mo...

rows.label: qst106012_msg0016
rows.name:
Well, if you put energyful
materials into charging device,
charging maybe finish quicker.

rows.label: qst106012_msg0017
rows.name:
Item called E-Pack is most efficient,
but other materials also okay.

rows.label: qst106012_msg0018
rows.name:
Quickest plan probably to
get mercenaries to collect
many E-Pack for us!

rows.label: qst106012_msg0019
rows.name:
Makes sense, I guess. Then
maybe we'll do that.

rows.label: qst106012_msg0020
rows.name:
Just hang in there a little
longer, all right, Hana-chan?

rows.label: qst106012_msg0021
rows.name:
Hana okay to wait! Good luck
with charging, everyone!
